long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Unclutter your Pinterest experience! The "Pinterest Ads & Promo Remover" extension for Chrome ensures a seamless browsing journey by efficiently removing ads and promotional content from Pinterest. Dive straight into the content you love, without any interruptions.

Features:

- Ad-Free Browsing: Say goodbye to distracting and unwanted ads. Enjoy a pure Pinterest experience.
- Clean Interface: Without promotional content, navigate through your favorite pins effortlessly.
- Easy to Use: Simply install and let the extension do its magic. No complicated settings or configurations.
- Lightweight: Designed to be minimalistic, ensuring that your browser performance is never compromised.
- Safe & Secure: We respect your privacy. The extension does not collect or share any of your data.
- Multi-Language Support: Whether you're browsing Pinterest in English, Spanish, French, or any other language, our extension works seamlessly, ensuring an ad-free experience across all language versions of the site.
- Additional feature: filter pin hiding by keywords. For example, you can add "ikea" or "etsy" and all pins with these words will be hidden.
- Added new features: 
1) Hide search suggestions like: "Popular on Pinterest", "Ideas for you". 
2) Hide video pins.
3) Hide Shoppable Pins

Installation:
1. Click on the "Add to Chrome" button.
2. Once installed, head over to Pinterest and see the change for yourself!

Support & Feedback:
We are constantly improving and updating. If you have any feedback or face any issues, please reach out to us.

Experience Pinterest the way it was meant to be – clean, simple, and focused on what you love. Download "Pinterest Ads & Promo Remover" today!
